OOC: Err, because of lack of tasks for my characters, I'm losing interest. =
 I need stuff to do!  The only interesting thing happening is with Orchestr=
a and all that stuff.  Megatron, give my damn Decepticons something to do! =
 Iron Raptor, my Maximals are bored!

BIC:  ::Orchestra/Composer/My Decepti=
cons/Weapon::

Orchestra landed at the IGL base.  He sent a message to all =
IGL guards and staff and stuff in the area.

"This is Orchestra of the Pred=
acons, I am here to pickup Blacknightmare.  May I watch her battle or go en=
d it or wait out here?" said Orchestra.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~=
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Composer went over to Wheeljack.

"Hey Wheeljack,=
 how's it going?" Composer asked, putting his hand on Wheeljack's shoulder.=

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
The Bodicons =
were bored.  They wandered around the interior of the Dark Avian.

"Megatro=
n," Decapitron asked through his comm-link, "Do you have an assignment for =
me and my Bodicons?"
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~=
~~~~~~
Triggerhappy, Skullgrin, Jume and Whee landed by the opposite side o=
f the Maximal base, the opposite of the side that Weapon was attacking.

"Y=
ou greasy, smelly, rotten, nasty Maximals!  We want to make a trade with yo=
u!  We request to see Iron Raptor immediately!" Triggerhappy shouted out, t=
rying to act as leaderly as he could.

"Guys, have your weapons ready in ca=
se they decide to fire!" Triggerhappy ordered.

Skullgrin had his gun aimed=
 at the base, and Jume and Whee had their weapons ready as well, not quite =
understanding what was going on.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~=
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Weapon was getting bored with the Maximals.  He walked a=
way, and then activated some jet-wings and flew towards the Dark Avian...

=

~The Keeper of Souls~
~The Shadow of the Dark~
~I Am, The Lurker of the Ab=
yss~
